p: To explore the functional significance of the investigated CpG sites, in silico analysis was conducted to identify potential transcription factors that bind these regions. Transcription factor binding site prediction identified putative binding sites for NK2 homeobox 1 (Nkx2-1), E2F Transcription Factor 1 (E2F-1), Wilmsâ€™ tumour protein 1 (WT1 I) and GC-Rich Sequence DNA-Binding Factor (GCF) ( Figure 4).
